Detailed Description

Simple Resource manager which implements a FCFS strategy for a single resource @ see Resource

Adds the resource to the set of resources managed by the Resource Manager. should check if the resource is already present in such set

nnumber of unit (for supporting multi-unit resources), by default is 1.

Definition at line 58 of file resmanager.cpp.

void callEndRun ( )
staticinherited

The same as callNewRun(), but it is called at the end of every run.

See Also
callEndRun

Definition at line 89 of file entity.cpp.

void callNewRun ( )
staticinherited

Returns the pointer to the entity with the specified name or NULL if such entity does not exists. Recursively calls newRun() on every entity in the system. It is automatically called at the beginning of every run by the Simulation class. Not to be called by the user!! In a future release will be hidden.

See Also
callNewRun

Definition at line 69 of file entity.cpp.

void endRun ( )
virtual

Reset the entity status at the end of every run. This function is called automatically at the end of every run, and its job consists in resetting the entity status (for example closing files, etc.) Warning: in endRun() is not permitted to create/destroy new entity objects.

Implements Entity.

Definition at line 43 of file fcfsresmanager.cpp.

inlinestaticinherited

Obtains the pointer to the object from the ID. Quite useful for debugging.

Parameters
idthe object ID.
Returns
the pointer to the entity corresponding to that ID, or NULL if it doesn't exist an object with that ID.

Definition at line 125 of file entity.hpp.

void newRun ( )
virtual

Resets the entity status at the beginning of every run. This function is called automatically at the beginning of every run, and its job consists in initializing the entity status. Warning: in newRun() is not permitted to create/destroy new entity objects.

Implements Entity.

Definition at line 39 of file fcfsresmanager.cpp.

void release ( AbsRTTask *  t,
const std::string &  name,
int  n = 1 
)
inherited

Function called by a task instr to perform the release of a specific resource. The consequence of this call could be the reactivation of one or more suspended tasks.

Todo:
Should check if the resource is among the ones handled by this manager, and was locked before
Parameters
ttask
nameresource name
nnumber of units (by default is 1).
bool request ( AbsRTTask *  t,
const std::string &  name,
int  n = 1 
)
inherited

Function called by a task instr (the WaitInstr) to perform an access request to a specific resource. That access could be granted or the task could be suspended. It returns true if the resource has been locked succesfully; it returns false if the task has been blocked.

Todo:
: Should check if the resource is among the ones handled by this manager
Parameters
ttask
nameresource name
nnumber of units (by default is 1).
void setKernel ( AbsKernel *  k,
Scheduler *  s 
)
protectedinherited

Set the kernel and the associated scheduler. Do not call this function from your main program!! This function is automatically called by the RTKernel::setResManager().

See Also
RTKernel
